\documentclass[crop, tikz, margin = 0mm]{standalone}
\usepackage{pdfpages}
\usetikzlibrary{fit}

\definecolor{ONSblue}{RGB}{25, 58, 87}
\definecolor{monokai-orange}{RGB}{252, 152, 103}
\definecolor{monokai-yellow}{RGB}{255, 216, 102}

\tikzstyle{content} = [inner sep=0pt, outer sep=0pt, rounded corners=1mm]
\tikzstyle{content inner} = [content, clip]
\tikzstyle{content wrapper} = [content, fill=none, line width=.33pt]



\begin{document}
	\foreach \pagecontent in {1,6,7} {%
		\tikz{
			\node[content inner] (content) {
				\includegraphics[
					page=\pagecontent,
					trim={0mm 0mm 0mm 0mm},
					clip
				]{book.pdf}
			};
		%
			\node[
				content wrapper,
				fit=(content),
%				draw,
%				ultra thick,
%				monokai-orange
			] (export) {};
		}
	}
\end{document}
